Prevalence.Estimate.Name: {nawa2020seroprevalence}
Author: Nawa et al.
source_population: Population value is from \url{https://www.city.utsunomiya.tochigi.jp/shisei/gaiyo/1007461.html} (accessed July 12th).
source_deathsdata: For \citet{nawa2020seroprevalence}, we concluded that 0 deaths had occurred based on official records for the Tochigi prefecture (see \url{https://www.nippon.com/en/japan-data/h00657/}; accessed July 12th, 2021).  For the infection interval we use the lowest bound of the confidence interval given for the ``unimputed dataset'' and the upper bound of the confidence interval given for the ``imputed dataset'' from Table 1 of \citet{nawa2020seroprevalence}.   Note that among the 181 participants in the \citet{nawa2020seroprevalence} sutdy who were aged 65 years or older none were positive (0/181).  This suggests that the prevalence amongst those at greatest risk of death (i.e., amongst the elderly) may be lower than in the greater population.  However, since the \citet{nawa2020seroprevalence} found only 3 positive cases out of 742 individuals tested, inference on this is limited.
